short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn LinkedIn profile into the ChatGPT style conversational resume.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥 Recruiters Are Stalking You! But What Are They REALLY Seeing? 🔥

What if you could see exactly what recruiters focus on in your LinkedIn profile? With the Xprtis chrome extension, not only will you gain these insights, but you'll also be able to:

AI Chatbot Your Profile: Turn your static LinkedIn profile into a AI powered chatroom where YOU'RE the Star. Recruiters won't just scroll; they'll stay and chat! 🎉

Train Your AI: Showcase your experiences in the best light, tailored to what recruiters are looking for. You can train the Xprtis AI model to showcase your untold skills like a pro. It's like having a personal PR agent! 🌟

24/7 Career Guru: Receive on-demand career guidance from Xprtis AI assistant. Whether you're crafting an InMail, cover letter or enhancing your profile, we've got you covered.🕵️‍♀️

With the Xprtis extension, all of this becomes reality—not just magic! Although, there's a sprinkle of that too! 🧙‍♂️

Ready to take the control over your LinkedIn profile? Your LinkedIn profile is a reflection of your professional journey. Make sure it tells the story you want.

---------------------------------------
★★ HOW TO USE ★★
---------------------------------------

➡️ Click the “Add to Chrome” button on this page.
➡️ Extension will redirect you to an random LinkedIn profile where you will find the extension’s chat window on right-hand side.  
➡️ You are all set!  You can continue as guest or sign in with your Google account to get more credits for use.

-------------------------
★★ FAQs ★★
-------------------------

🧐 Is it free or paid?
While Xprtis offers a robust set of features for free, our premium version is available at $29.99/month, unlocking even more advanced capabilities.

🧐 How does the AI assistant help improve my LinkedIn profile?
Xprtis's AI assistant analyzes your profile, offering suggestions to enhance its appeal. It can guide you in crafting compelling narratives, optimizing keywords, and ensuring your experiences shine.

🧐 How does the chatbot feature work on my LinkedIn profile?
The chatbot feature transforms your profile into an interactive experience. When recruiters or connections visit, they can engage in real-time conversations, allowing for more dynamic interactions than traditional messaging.

🧐 Is my data safe with Xprtis?
Absolutely. Xprtis prioritizes user privacy and security. We only access data necessary for the features you use, and we never share or sell your information to third parties.

🧐 Can I customize the AI's responses and interactions?
Yes, you can! Xprtis is designed to be flexible. You can train the AI based on your experiences and preferences, ensuring that interactions on your profile remain authentic and true to your professional journey.

-------------------------
★★ ABOUT ★★
-------------------------

I'm Nishant, the founder of Xprtis. As one of the first 100 employees at LinkedIn, from 2006 to 2015, I've been at the forefront of the platform's evolution. I've seen firsthand the power of a strong LinkedIn profile. But there's always been a missing piece: understanding and controlling how recruiters perceive and interact with your profile. That's where Xprtis steps in, granting users complete control over their LinkedIn profiles by transforming them into AI avatars of themselves.

----
